        public Method getAnnotatedMethod​(Class<?> root,
                                 Method implementation)
        Find the annotated resource method or sub-resource method / sub-resource locator in the class hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        root - The root resource class.
        implementation - The resource method or sub-resource method / sub-resource locator implementation
